body: i hope they make a continuation

This is an arg(Alternate Reality Game).cut off heads are a trait seen in demons (example clowns) as a way to exercise them, as well as no nails correlating to a form of torture via pulling the nails of people off, I know that it was used as a form of torture used to get answers out of people in one point of time. I do think theirs something else going on like how the main body appeared as that same form and not as one of the ghost infant/fetus's going in them. I don't know exactly what's happening but it's something like that. THIS IS THE (did that to show it's something different) "Chinure Warashi ARG"
This is one quite creepy doujin isn't it.

Holy shit. This has gone from bad to hopeful to… we’re doomed.
Dark ending
BRO this was so interesting  I would've perfered it without the sex scenes tho

The chain story curse reminds me of the usual your parents will die messages on the comments that used to be prevalent. So in the story it happens that only those who are psychically/spiritually gifted would suffer from those chain message curses. Interesting.
Curses are powerful things in horror. This is just like Ring, Ju On and Final Destination, you know the characters are screwed and destined to die.
Sad and abrupt ending.
Art reminds me of Bar Peachpit. Same artist?I like the island miko story and the native girls story.

Guys guys hear me out. The girls might have a chance of surviving this time. We know that in the previous incident the victim was still alive even after having a ruptured abdomen, but died shortly after when they operated on her because of the tumor. So since the victims now don't have those tumor there might be a chance to save them. I know this sounds delusional and too copium, but after spending 300 pages in this story I refuse to have that as an ending. They're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay they're going to be okay jte9v7gj4bai theysr 9tnsufbghaytherheyfktojfiwhcutheycjglijgnikqytheucgocnitifbenaokay
It was quite a shame when this started having the sex scenes, everything else was way more interesting. Shame about the ending though.

okay that was actually a very cool horror read. this REALLY needs the story arc tag. i wish the artist would've just decided to get waaaay less focused on the ero parts, the story and pacing at the last half is pretty good! sadly i think the first third drags like hell. still i hope the artist keeps doong horror stuff!!!!
Fuck this this is worse than 177013 at least that shit had a happy ending
Haha, I don't understand, but ok I guess
This is probably one of the best stories I've read on nhentai. Reminds me why I read guro.
Amazing story. This is why I read guro manga.
I was expecting a happy ending, this shit actually made me cry. 10/10. Good art, plot, and gore.

Noooo... Not Madoka and Ea, why you kill them both?? 😭
Fuck mimori who fuck everything up...
A horror story where there is no way to get out of the situation you put yourself in is probably one of the darkest kinds, but god are they enjoyable.
And for anyone who don’t like gore, pls blacklist #guro in your search. Some works are so disturbing, better not knowing it in the first place

Fuck it. I was half expecting a birth scene, but really curious why there was only a pregnant tag but no birth tag… fuck it. The gore and horror isn’t that scary but the story was quite sad, all in the end was horrendously hopeless struggles for the girls. Would be so good if the girls birth the ghosts and the ghosts do the #unbirth, but I guess this is good enough
Damn! What a piece of shit!... the whatever it is, not the story.

*gets to the end*  well.... fuck.
I have literally only logged in for the sole purpose of call those ghosts a bunch of ungrateful little shits.

I guess that ghost keeps its contract no matter what.  
Accept it to your body, tumors; Reject it too long, rape and tumors; Attempt to birth it in a fetus, does it alien style; Abort it in a fetus, damn thing goes back to being a "ghost of unborn children", now really pissed off, rape and tumors;  Plan to birth it via c-section, bet it does alien style before you can, or it dies then goes abortion route.
Seems like a 100% loss to me, even if you were to nuke it from space there's no way.

The irony is that Madoka's plan actually killed her completely pointlessly.  Without it the worst case seems two girls and Uno die... If she didn't try to get pregnant then she and Uno would survive. Would've liked to see more reaction scenes too.
It'd probably sell decently as a traditional horror if the ages were tweaked and smut toned down a little.
I find this difficult to masturbate to
this is definetly missing the "story arc" tag, please add
What a cunt ghost, just wait a month or two and get born the normal way??
Man i loved the plot twist. Awesome work kakeru-sensei

I... I 
I have no words. Fuck you author, that twist ending is bullshit. I'm sad, shocked and angry all at the same time. Well fucking played, but you're losing a favourite.

Now excuse me while I deal with this weird feeling in my womb.
I really loved those girls... I feel awful

The last time i was this involved in the plot of a hentai was 5 years ago! This was really good, the storytelling was on point and that end will keep me up at night, because i'll be honest i'm a fucking pussy when it comes to the horror genre (seriously, i had nightmares for a week after watching "I Am Legend" the first time), but this was so good that i can't really be mad.
it was a good story until the ending
Man such an intriguing horror story. Medium-length and got the dread kinda on point. The plot is also consistent and the gore is so well done lol.

i actually felt like i was watching an anime. towards the end i was so happy and ready for the wholesome ending but OOF. BAD ENDING. that thing really is a monster.. although overall i loved this a fuck ton.

The bells of hell are ringing. 
A peal of twisted joy. 
They celebrate the bringing of a bastard baby boy.           

At birth his soul was taken. 
All love replaced with hate. 
He's now the child of satan, a child whose might is great.           

Three all tried to intervene, the father, son, and ghost. 
None of them could come between this child and it's host.             

For once the act of killing would not be classed as sin.
For everyday he's living, Armageddon closes in.
Can this even be considered as a hentai? I was so enveloped into the story that I forgot it was a hentai.
Well... my original goal was to fap when I came on this site, but instead I just got really invested into this horror story, especially since I'm high af... was pretty good
damn im not that into horror or gore when trying to masturbate but that actually was captivating

I absolutely hate it 
But damn is it good
Eh..... I don't came for this kind of history but interesting indeed
this has amazing storytelling and is also... Really Long........... props to the translator and mangaka

Holy shit this is truly a masterpiece of storytelling. Fully captivating and horrifying at the same time. I can't even explain how terrified page 146 made me. The ending kinda pissed me off but I'm.also.drunk so maybe that's why lmao one of my favourites on this site, but not masturbation purposes.
